result.reason: Enhances usability by allowing users to quickly see the number of connections within folders in the tree view.
result.approach: Modify the AspectGetter in NameColumn.cs. Check if the item is a ContainerInfo. If it is, use GetRecursiveChildList() to count the number of descendant nodes with TreeNodeType.Connection and append this count to the formatted name (e.g., "Name (Count)").
